snippet: An airline trade and lobby group said United States airlines would carry 222 million passengers between June 1 and Aug. 31, topping the summer of 2007 when 217.6 million people flew.
abstract: Airlines for America trade and lobby group says United States airlines will carry record 222 million passengers between June 1 and Aug 31, topping summer of 2007 when 217.6 million passengers traveled.
lead_paragraph: An airline trade and lobby group said United States airlines would carry 222 million passengers between June 1 and Aug. 31, topping the summer of 2007 when 217.6 million people flew.

headline.main: U.S. Airlines Will Set Record for Summer Passenger Traffic
headline.print_headline: U.S. Airlines Will Set Record for Summer Passenger Traffic
